name: Ominous Horizons: A Paladin's Calling
description:
Ominous Horizons: A Paladin's Calling is an action-shooter game developed by N'Lightning Software Development. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by N'Lightning Software Development.
You can play Ominous Horizons: A Paladin's Calling on PC.
It was produced by Ralph Bagley. It was directed by Christopher Perkins. It was scored by Curtis Clark, Gary W. Richards, Keith Cawthorne and Mark T. Johnson.
